page.title: 09A DAY IN BEN DALE'S LIFE
page.content: A typical day for me would be to get up at 7.00 and then at 7.30 have a bowl of Frosties. I get ready for school at 8.20 and go round for my friend Peter. We get to school at about 8.45,we play until 9.00.We usually do maths in the morning. After dinner we usually do history or topic. At 2.15 we have a 20 minutes playtime. After playtime we have P.E.,reading or story. At 3.30 we leave school. When I get home I get changed and then I usually play with Peter, We play games like hide and seek and man hunt. I usually have my tea at about 5.15. after tea I either go to cubs or play out on my bike. I go in at 8.15 and watch television or read books. I have cherry cheese cake and a cup of cocoa. I go to bed at about 9.30.
